projects.name: expa3
projects.shortdesc: Internal platform for members of AIESEC to manage exchange related and membership related data as well as view analytics.
projects.description:
Internal platform for members of AIESEC to manage exchange related and membership related data as well as view analytics.

I was the project manager working with a technical development team and designer as well as talent from inside AIESEC as well as external consultants in order to build this project.

images.desc: View analytics in a tabular format.
View and manage applicants to opportunities.

projects.name: AIESEC in Switzerland
projects.shortdesc: National website for AIESEC in Switzerland, for students to view and apply for opportunities to go on an exchange as well as manage their applications.
projects.description:
National website for AIESEC in Switzerland, for students to view and apply for opportunities to go on an exchange as well as manage their applications.

Built with Vue.js and Django.

projects.name: Impact Brazil
projects.shortdesc: A website for students and young professionals to explore and apply for volunteering and professional opportunities in Brazil. Powered by AIESEC.
projects.description:
A website for students and young professionals to explore and apply for volunteering and professional opportunities in Brazil. Powered by AIESEC.

Built with Vue.js and Django.

projects.name: PayPal Processor for Salesforce
projects.shortdesc: Add features on Salesforce to allow customers to pay for goods or services online, giving you the ability to view and manage transactions and generate transaction reports.
projects.description: Add features on Salesforce to allow customers to pay for goods or services online, giving you the ability to view and manage transactions and generate transaction reports.

images.desc: Payment page to the customer, powered by PayPal.

projects.name: Member Connect
projects.shortdesc: A platform for the Talent Management departments of AIESEC in India to manage recruitmens, talent in the organization and view analytics.
projects.description: A platform for the Talent Management departments of AIESEC in India to manage recruitmens, talent in the organization and view analytics.

projects.name: LEAD Platform
projects.shortdesc: This platform serves as a digital support system for youth on international exchange, providing them with knowledge and resources that are best for them, at every point in time of their journey.
projects.description: This platform serves as a digital support system for youth on international exchange, providing them with knowledge and resources that are best for them, at every point in time of their journey.

projects.name: June National Conference App
projects.shortdesc: An application for the delegates of the "June National Conference" to view agendas, download session outputs, give feedback and receive realtime notifications about the conference.
projects.description: An application for the delegates of the "June National Conference" to view agendas, download session outputs, give feedback and receive realtime notifications about the conference.

projects.name: 'Summer Like Never Before' Profile Photo Generator
projects.shortdesc: A Facebook Profile Photo generator for a marketing campaign.
projects.description: A Facebook Profile Photo generator for a marketing campaign.

projects.name: Discover India Cover Generator
projects.shortdesc: A Facebook Cover Photo generator for an international campaign promoting youth to visit India for volunteering and profesional development opportunities.
projects.description: A Facebook Cover Photo generator for an international campaign promoting youth to visit India for volunteering and profesional development opportunities.

projects.name: galaxySMS
projects.shortdesc: A proof-of-concept Site Management System allowing uploading and downloading of resources.
projects.description: A proof-of-concept Site Management System allowing uploading and downloading of resources.

projects.name: Super Mario Bros. Level Designer
projects.shortdesc: A proof-of-concept level designer to design levels that match the theme of the video game "Super Mario Bros."
projects.description: A proof-of-concept level designer to design levels that match the theme of the video game "Super Mario Bros."

projects.name: Pokémon RPG Concept
projects.shortdesc: A proof-of-concept recreation of the video game "Pokémon" to demonstrate video games in JavaScript and HTML5.
projects.description: A proof-of-concept recreation of the video game "Pokémon" to demonstrate video games in JavaScript and HTML5.
